title: 10-20 frame rate stutters regardless of settings.
body:
I've recently started to have an issue where I get intermittent 10-20 FPS frame stutters regardless of what my FPS cap is set to. I have a high end machine and can run the game smoothly at 144fps. It will drop to ~120 FPS every couple of seconds when I'm moving my champion but if I hold still, there aren't any stutters. I tried dropping it to 60 FPS to see if it was a performance issue but even at 60 FPS it drops to 50 FPS or so every couple of seconds while moving. 

Any idea what could be causing these stutters?

replies.body: If your pc is too good, it can actually run into snags, see if this [high spec pc guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209010626-Frame-Skipping-on-High-End-PCs) can help.  There could be other driver, hardware, or setting causing these sudden drops too but our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide can help rule out some of these possibilities.  Give those steps a go and test it in a custom game to see if ith elps.
